LanguageData.OE_Helmet_Kid.label: obsidia kid helmet
LanguageData.OE_Helmet_Kid.description: Light helmet, well protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire kids.
LanguageData.OE_Helmet_Kid_Spacer.label: obsidia kid helmet(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OE_Helmet_Kid_Spacer.description: Light helmet, well protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire kids.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OE_Armor_Kid.label: obsidia kid armor
LanguageData.OE_Armor_Kid.description: Light armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire kids.
LanguageData.OE_Armor_Kid_Spacer.label: obsidia kid armor(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OE_Armor_Kid_Spacer.description: Light armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire kids.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OE_Helmet_Proto.label: obsidia proto helmet
LanguageData.OE_Helmet_Proto.description: Proto power armor Helmet, perfectly protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire warriors several centuries ago.
LanguageData.OE_Armor_Proto.label: obsidia proto armor
LanguageData.OE_Armor_Proto.description: Proto power armor, perfectly protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire warriors several centuries ago.
